ProjectObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

ProjectObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

ProjectObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Project Reference related to which Project Task Resources should be processed by the wws

validation.validation: Task Resources cannot be create for Inactive Project.(Project:[project])
The Project Reference provided refers to a Project that is not updatable either because the Project was never created or the Project was Canceled or Denied.  Project Reference: [id][reference]

Project_Task_Resources_Data.description: This flag controls whether or not to replace existing Project Task Resources for the Project. When true, existing Project Task Resources are removed before the data in this web service request is processed.
Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

validation.validation: Please enter either Project Reference or Project ID

Project_Task_Resource_Line_Data.description: This flag controls whether specified Project Task Resource should be deleted (When Replace All Flag is true,then value of delete flag is ignored)

validation.validation: Delete Flag cannot be True if no Project Task Resource Reference is specified or provided Project Task Resource Reference doesn't exist(Project Task Resource:[tr id])
Project Task Resource cannot be deleted as its tied to Project(Project Task Resource:[tr],Project;[project])
Project Task Resource MLV Webservice Criticals

Project_Plan_TaskObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Project_Plan_TaskObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Project_Plan_TaskObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: The Project Plan Task must be part of the selected Project (Project Plan Task: [task reference], Project: [project reference]).

Project_Resource_Plan_DetailObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Project_Resource_Plan_DetailObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Project_Resource_Plan_DetailObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: The Resource Plan Detail must be part of the selected Project (Resource Plan Detail: [rpd reference], Project: [project reference]).

Project_ResourceObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Project_ResourceObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Project_ResourceObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Project_Task_Resource_Line_Data.description: Worker and Unnamed Resource reference for the Project Task Resource

validation.validation: The Worker must be part of the selected Resource Plan Line (Worker: [worker reference], Resource Plan Line [rpd reference])

Project_Task_Resource_Line_Data.description: Resource Start Date for the Project Task Resource
Resource End Date for the Project Task Resource
% Allocation for the Project Task Resource

validation.validation: Task Percentage allocation cannot be entered if work relationship type is association for a Resource Plan detail (Resource Plan Detail: [rpd reference])

Project_Task_Resource_Line_Data.description: Estimated Hours  for the Project Task Resource
Memo for the Project Task Resource

Project_Task_Resources_Data.description: Element containing Project Task Resources related data to be processed by the wws

validation.validation: Resource End Date cannot be before the Resource Start Date.
validation.description: Resource End Date cannot be before the Resource Start Date.

description: Wrapper Element for Put Task Resource Line Data Element

validation.validation: Project Task Resource Reference cannot be reassigned to a new Project
The Web Service is set to Add Only; documents cannot be resubmitted.
